name: Sonne Hotel Quang Binh
address: 33 Đường Phạm Văn Đồng, Ðộng Hỏi, Việt Nam
description:
Sonne Hotel Quang Binh cung cấp chỗ nghỉ tại Ðộng Hỏi. Ngoài sân hiên, khách sạn 2 sao này có các phòng được trang bị điều hòa và Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó mỗi phòng sẽ có phòng tắm riêng. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ cho khách.

Tại khách sạn, mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có tủ quần áo. Các phòng đều đi kèm với bàn làm việc và TV màn hình phẳng, ngoài ra một số phòng tại Sonne Hotel Quang Binh có ban công. Tại chỗ nghỉ, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Sonne Hotel Quang Binh 6 km.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Ông chủ cũng nhiệt tình. Vị trí ko cách xa ga tàu mấy, tiện di chuyển.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tốt
review.comment_negative: Vệ sinh

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Không có gì thích
review.comment_negative: Chủ khách sạn tồi tệ, lươn lẹo, không trung thực

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Clean tidy hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel room!
We had a kettle, fridge, fan, AC. Provided with bottled water when we were leaving. 
Bed was super comfy
review.comment_negative: Not many restaurants nearby but close to the train station!

review.rating: Very good choice for the price
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The hotel was perfect for our brief one-night stay. We arrived in the evening and were leaving for a train early the next morning so we were choosing solely by price and distance from the train station. This hotel had a good location (not too far from the train station and nearby to some streetfood options) and was very cheap by European standards, so we just went for it (while not really having any expectations). But it was clean, had AC, good furniture, minibar and the personnel were helpful and kind, so it pleasantly surprised us and exceeded our expectations. :-)

review.rating: Comfortable hotel, good value for money!
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
We stayed in Dong Hoi just to be picked up to see paradise caves so didn’t spend much time there. The hotel was very comfortable and the reception was open 24/7 which is great for people like us who travel in with a night train/bus. No matter when you turn up or check out someone will be there! The receptionist was really nice, caring all the way through even until we ordered our grab he came out to make sure it was the right ride! 

No bells and whistles about the room or location, it does what it needs to do for an overnight stay.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The beds are amazing - coming from some days/ week of only hard beds we feel like on a cloud. The room is very spacious, as well the bathroom. The shower is great, all is clean.
The location is very close to the train station (15 minutes walk) which was perfect for us.
Winmart, a Café and some other food stalls are close by.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Very clean and comfortable rooms. Close to the railway station. Owner very friendly and speaks a little bit of German.

review.rating: Good value for money. Close enough to train station

This hotel had a good location (not too far from the train station and nearby to some streetfood options) and was very cheap by European standards, so we just went for it (while not really having any expectations). But it was clean, had AC, good furniture, minibar and the personnel were helpful and kind, so it pleasantly surprised us and exceeded our expectations. :-)

review.rating: Comfortable hotel, good value for money!
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
We stayed in Dong Hoi just to be picked up to see paradise caves so didn’t spend much time there. The hotel was very comfortable and the reception was open 24/7 which is great for people like us who travel in with a night train/bus. No matter when you turn up or check out someone will be there! The receptionist was really nice, caring all the way through even until we ordered our grab he came out to make sure it was the right ride! 

No bells and whistles about the room or location, it does what it needs to do for an overnight stay.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The beds are amazing - coming from some days/ week of only hard beds we feel like on a cloud. The room is very spacious, as well the bathroom. The shower is great, all is clean.
The location is very close to the train station (15 minutes walk) which was perfect for us.
Winmart, a Café and some other food stalls are close by.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Very clean and comfortable rooms. Close to the railway station. Owner very friendly and speaks a little bit of German.

review.rating: Good value for money. Close enough to train station
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Close enough to train station. Clean and quiet

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King

review.comment_positive: Clean tidy hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel room!
We had a kettle, fridge, fan, AC. Provided with bottled water when we were leaving. 
Bed was super comfy
